copy.panelLoad: Searching by the Pixie Dust Tree...
copy.panelFail: Oops! There was a problem. Please try again.
copy.tip1: It's easy to make new friends in Pixie Hollow!
copy.tip2: Visit Summit Style for the latest Fairy fashions!
copy.tip3: Like to make clothes? Visit Bobbin's Tailoring Nook!
copy.tip4: Fly to Mendy's Tailoring Nook to make new shoes, belts and sashes!
copy.tip5: Visit Bella's Baubles for the latest accessories and more!
copy.tip6: Go see the baby animals in Beck's Animal Nursery!
copy.tip7: Want a new hairstyle? Fly to Schelly's Hair Salon!
copy.tip8: Like helping bubbly fish? Play Bubble Bounce in Dewdrop Vale!
copy.tip9: Want to help hungry critters? Play Harvest Hustle in Pumpkin Patch!
copy.tip10: Love to catch flower petals? Play Petal Pick-Up in Cherryblossom Heights!
copy.tip11: Like to sort Lost Things? Play Tinker Toss in Cottonpuff Field!
copy.tip12: Do you love fireflies? Play Firefly Light-Up in Springtime Orchard!
copy.tip13: Like sorting games? Play Seed Sorter in Treetop Bend!
copy.tip14: Do you like to catch snowflakes? Play Snowflake Sweep in Evergreen Overlook!
copy.tip15: Love fireworks? Play Fairy Fireworks in Acorn Summit!
copy.tip16: Learn to bake cookies at Dulcie's Kitchen!
copy.tip17: Visit Copper's Tinkering Nook to make home items!
copy.tip18: Decorate your very own Fairy home with items from shops!
copy.tip19: Find public parties in the Pixie Postings! Make friends, play games and dance!
copy.tip20: Read the Pixie Postings in Havendish Square for all the latest news!
copy.tip21: Visit Fairy Tale Theater to be in a play!
copy.tip22: The Ballroom in Havendish Square is only open on special occasions!
copy.tip23: Tired of flying? Have a rest in the Tearoom!
copy.tip24: The Tearoom is a great place to sit and chat with a new friend!
copy.tip25: Look for ingredient bunches to gather with your friends!
copy.tip26: Did you know that Tabby receives thousands of questions each week?
copy.tip27: Did you know that Fawn loves to play pranks?
copy.tip28: Iridessa loves to learn new things and solve mysteries!
copy.tip29: Did you know that Tinker Bell's favorite flower is the Silverbell?
copy.tip30: Did you know that Fairies smell like cinnamon?
copy.tip31: The first time a human baby laughs, a new Fairy or Sparrow Man is born!
copy.tip32: Fairies and Sparrow Men celebrate their Arrival Days just like humans celebrate birthdays!
copy.tip33: Did you know that "Kchr chrick?" means "Want to share my acorn?" in Squirrel language?
